name: Magic Elpis Gem
description: "Elpis Battle is a Tactical Turn-Based game built on Binance Smart Chain Blockchain. The main goal of the game is that the player will assemble a group of characters to explore the world in the game. Besides, they can improve the group's strength with the equipment system such as the equipment, skill, pet, consumable item. MEG is in-game currency use for almost function in Elpis Battle."
